Options:

B. Aidan Quinn
C. Ulysses S. Grant

Answer: A) Josh Brolin, B) Aidan Quinn

Question: Which characters are connected through their roles in the movie 'Jonah Hex'?
Options:

B. Aidan Quinn portrays Ulysses S. Grant

D. Aidan Quinn features in the movie for only three days
Answer: A) Lieutenant Evan interacts with Jonah Hex, B) Aidan Quinn portrays Ulysses S. Grant, D) Aidan Quinn features in the movie for only three days
